default: 55g/2oz fresh cherries, stems and stones removed

steps: Heat the double cream with the orange zest and lime zest in a saucepan over a low-medium heat. Pour the cream mixture over the melted white chocolate in a bowl and stir.
Place the cherries, segmented oranges and marshmallows into a serving bowl and pour over the white chocolate mixture.
Use a mini blowtorch to brown the top of the mixture and garnish with mint leaves. Serve immediately.
title: White chocolate and orange soup with toasted marshmallows
